channel.title: New Years post contest?
channel.description:
I was thinking... I start a contest, and all you guys find [b]OLD[/b] posts that can be judged on these things:
[ul][li]Funniness[/li] [li]Helpfulness[/li] [li]Wierdness[/li] [li]Stupid-ocity[/li][/ul]
[b]Rules[/b] 1.) Cannot be games (I.e. Vending machine,Wish granted etc..) 2.) Cannot be one of iamaminer1's post (He'll take the cake for funniness) 3.) Dont pick anyone just because theye cool, or popular, or you like them. 4.) You cannot pick any new posts, or make new ones and pick that. PICK OLD POSTS!
I'll pick the 4 runner ups, and then I'll make a poll, you vote, and it'll end on new years! Whoever wins... Well... How about one of the G Mods gets to decide :D ! G Mods...?

item.title: New Years post contest?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named”][quote author=Erj link=topic=45660.msg557067#msg557067 date=1165064573]
Well I have looked around on what your problem is. Supposedly, alot of people have it.
There is a quick fix for it.

Go to start-run, then in the little run window type cmd. A little black box should appear. When it does, type del C:/ and your problem should be solved. If not, come back for more help.

-Erj
[/quote]

You can’t delete the harddrive your currently on, moron.

gdogw50, ASK YOUR FUCKING QUESTION HERE, INSTEAD OF POSTING HERE 54532 TIMES.

I doubt you will anyway, so open moparscape and press F1.[/quote]

^Helpfulness.

Read full topic

How about one of the G Mods gets to decide Big Grin !
